import React, { useState } from 'react' import Header from '../common/Header' import Footer from '../common/footer' import "./form1.css" import axios from "../axios" const Form=()=> { const [user,setUser]=useState({ post:"",name:"",email:"",branch:"",explain:"",city:"",course:"",phoneno:"",resume:"",check:"",linkedin:"",github:"", }); let name,value; const handleInputs=(e)=>{ console.log(e); name=e.target.name; value=e.target.value; setUser({...user,[name]:value} ) } const PostData=async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const {post,name,email,branch,explain,city,course,phoneno,resume,check,linkedin,github}=user; var res= await fetch("/register",{ method:"POST", headers:{ "Content-Type":"application/json" }, body:JSON.stringify({ post,name,email,branch,explain,city,course,phoneno,resume,check,linkedin,github }) }); var res=await res.json(); } const addForm=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() } return (
Please enter Your Name.
{/**/}
) } export default Form
